website_summaries.verdict: A practical military boot that comes at a decent price. Despite a few quirks, a good choice for the budget-conscious.
pros: Lightweight, comfortable, and fit for daily wear
cons: Many feel there's not enough padding around the ankle, which really matters in a boot that is 6 inches high

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Boot
customer_reviews.text: Decent comfort, but I hope you work in an office if you wear these to work...I work in the field and please take a look at the photo of what my boot looks like after 6 weeks:(....would rather spend twice what these cost and at least have the boots last six months...zippers are pretty cheap and tough to use...
customer_reviews.author: David Wayne

customer_reviews.title: Terrible quality control
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the first pair and they seemed fine - until I put them on. One boot had a noticable lump in the heel. I removed the insole to see if something was under it, but whatever was there was inside the sole (the area under the insole is pressed paper, by the way). Anyway, I sent them back for a replacement. I received the replacement a few days later only to see that the leather on the side has a hole in it, and I'm not sure how it passed a simple visual inspection. Anyway, I was 0-2 on these and I'm not trying for the trifecta. They're cheap price-wise, but even cheaper quality-wise. Order at your own risk.
customer_reviews.author: I buy lots of crap here

customer_reviews.title: These boots are pretty good, and really cheap
customer_reviews.text: I walk in the Mojave desert for a living. These boots are pretty good, and really cheap. I got both the 6" and 8" and like them both. With some gel insoles they are super comfortable. The zipper is superfluous on the 6" and and a likely weak point, so I don't use them; on the 8" it makes it easy to take them off at breaktime. The soles are relatively soft and get beat up by rocks, so, shoe-goo. Otherwise so far so good; I haven't had any trouble with the uppers or with feared delamination. So so much better than similarly-priced options at Wal-Mart (Ozark Fails). No half sizes is a drag, I need thick sox.
customer_reviews.author: C. C. Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Order True to size
customer_reviews.text: I usually wear N.B. 10.5D, I ordered these in size 11 thinking I would order 1/2 size up for heavy socks. Size 11 was a little too big. I have returned and am re-ordering size 10.5. Really nice construction, I will be applying waterproof spray to these boots when I receive them. 2nd reorder received and size 10.5 fit great, good room. I actually added a light 2nd insole to snug up the shoes and are wearing thick Costco hiking socks for additional comfort. I'll be back to walking my 100lb. Shepherd tomorrow and styling as I go! These are replacing my 10 year old Voodoo Tactical 6" desert boots. Can't beat the price.
customer_reviews.author: Bob C.

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected. Disappointing shoes.
customer_reviews.text: I wear a size 13 shoe and boot and expected a tight fit as usual. The size 13 that arrived lets me park my feet and two carry-on suitcases inside these boots. Holy moly. My toes can invite friends over, there’s so much extra room. These are not, in my opinion, comfortable for everyday wear, all-day wear, or active wear. I wore blisters into one foot wearing them into the office one day. In summary: lightweight but hard as a rock, too big, and extremely uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Michael A. Meystel

customer_reviews.title: Whya Zipper?
customer_reviews.text: The piece of fabric that spans the opening between the two halves of the zipper make the boot next to impossible to fully open and put on without undoing the laces. Then, what is the purpose of the zipper? This is my third pair of zippered boots purchased because I fly frequently enough that I don't care to get stuck at a security checkpoint putting my boots on and off. These boots are a disappointment. Up close, they look rather cheaply made.
customer_reviews.author: Don C. Guizzetti

customer_reviews.title: Appear to be an excellent value
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed with the appearance and quality if they hold up. I bought these for casual wear and ankle protection on my scooter. The fit is fine for a size 10. The insoles are fairly thick but I have added additional thin insoles to snug things up a bit. Either way works. I have fairly narrow feet. Unlike some reviewers I do not find a problem putting them on leaving them laced but just unzipping. I am sure how tight you want your laces affects this. I believe my laces are medium tight.
customer_reviews.author: drifter yank

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely wonderful boots!
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots! They are light, comfortable, and have great arch supports. They look great too! I wear a size 10 and usually prefer to get 10W, so I was very pleased that these came that way. They fit me like a glove. The zippers are smooth in their operation and the boots are easy to put on and take off fast. I will probably buy a second pair just because when these wear out I'll want to get another and I don't know if Amazon will be carrying them. They should because they are great! I'll update if I run into any issues but so far I love these boots!
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: Awesome shoe. Felt like a second skin on my feet the first time I put them on. SOO comfortable! Only just got them so I can't attest to wear issues, or waterproofing. But they are now my "go to" shoes. Been wearing white Nike's or similiar for years now - this shoe changes that for me. They also look fantastic with a pair of jeans. Bought the 4.5" rise, but I think my next order will be the 6" .
customer_reviews.author: Roy Danielsen

customer_reviews.title: Not military issued, but good for temporary wear...
customer_reviews.text: Great boots, I used it from my temporary uniform inside the Army. The active duty sergeant told me, I should had got the uniform from the exchange; but, what really matters, is the important sergeant that is over me accepted the temporary look just to do military business for one day. The boots are ankle boots, they are not military issue boots, they are like tennis shoes height. They will not go pass the ankle. If a person wants everyday military wear, go to the exchange or online at the exchange do your business there.
customer_reviews.author: Foster L.

customer_reviews.title: They fit to size
customer_reviews.text: Very comfy. I like them best with the extra memory foam insoles in, but unfortunately I can't keep the insoles from working thier way up the sides on my heals throughout the day, so have just taken the extra insoles out. They are just slightly smaller than the inside of boot so I think that is why they move around so much. Still happy with them for the price. Fit as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Brian S. Cropp

customer_reviews.title: What a Nice Surprise!
customer_reviews.text: I decided to take a chance on these boots based on numerous reviews which said they were a great deal. That said, I was skeptical - but they really ARE a great deal! They're well constructed, and comfortable right out of the box. I laced them up the first day and put in a couple of miles on concrete pavement on a hot day, and they felt like old, well-broken-in friends: no chafing, no hot spots, no blisters. I wear a 10 medium-to-wide, and the boots are true to size. Some reviewers have recommended putting in a better pair of insoles, but I'm not sure that's necessary.
customer_reviews.author: JAK

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, but poorly made
customer_reviews.text: Sadly these were good boots & they were very comfortable however the pair I received already showed signs of poor craftsmanship at the seams of the toe. Used them less than three hours in one day and already the seams started peeling at the toe end of the boot. Would consider purchasing again if they improve craftsmanships on the making of the boot. Also, the zipper on the side was very convenient for removing the boots.
customer_reviews.author: the scooter samurai

customer_reviews.title: Great boots at a surprisingly low price.
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots! I always bought Timberland boots for many years & my last pair, being well over $100, didn't even last a year & were actually pretty uncomfortable. So i gave these a try. They are very comfortable. So far have had them about 4 months and have put them through their paces. I work outside & play outdoor airsoft as well. They have held up perfectly. A bit dirty but they're boots so it's expected. These boots have surpassed boots way above their price range. I personally love these boots.
customer_reviews.author: Chawanga Butter

customer_reviews.title: I really like these boots
customer_reviews.text: I really like these boots. I use these boots not for extras heavy duties but to work in my yard and to walk around. They are very comfortable and light weight. In addition, several times my wife mentioned that they look good on me. The price cannot be beaten. I forgot to mention that they come with free pair of very nice socks.
customer_reviews.author: frenchy

customer_reviews.title: I'm  very happy with these boots.
customer_reviews.text: Out of the box the Ryno Gear boots slipped on my feet and they were perfect from the start. I read the reviews about them being a bit larger so ,taking into consideration that I wear a 9 1/2 wide, I ordered the size 9. They fit my feet better than my $150.00 work boots. To say they are comfortable on my feet is an understatement. The price is very reasonable for what you are getting. I can't comment about durability yet so I will come back later with an update. For my size foot and the reasonable price I highly recommend the boots.
customer_reviews.author: B. OwenTop Contributor: Cycling

customer_reviews.title: Great price to quality ratio
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I use these boots for working in the yard doing landscaping and stone work. Perfect for that use. Very comfortable, supportive, and made well. They are quite “padded” so not as sleek looking as some other boots that are 2X+ more expensive, but probably will be nice as temperature drop. I find the fit to be pretty spot on, if not a little on the big side; the size 12 feels like maybe a 12.5. As an added bonus Ryno included a very nice pair of socks with my order. Will update the review as appropriate
customer_reviews.author: Robert T.

customer_reviews.title: Thesee boots are good in the U.S not for overseas
customer_reviews.text: Thesee boots are ok, but not designed for rough terrains. I wore a pair of these while deployed overseas it didn't last more than 3 months.
customer_reviews.author: Raaz Dost

customer_reviews.title: Epic Boots!
customer_reviews.text: Love the boots, got a lot of compliments at work, they have protected my feet and kept them from getting too hot. Best of both worlds. And they are comfortable! They are easy to put on and will stay on your feet well without tightening the laces, (just using the zipper) They have held up well so far. Definitely worth it. Plus who doesn’t like a free pair of socks with your order!
customer_reviews.author: Lucas Eagle

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and unbeatable price.
customer_reviews.text: I've had these for about a month. They seem to be well made boots. It took 3 days for them to "break in" and are now very comfortable, especially with the carhartt boot inserts. Update 7/25/18: While I do like the feel and fit of the boots, I am sad to report they are just not very rugged. I only wore these until mid May about 3 times per week. In the 4 months of use, the bottom of the boot has worn thru and interior lining completely fallen apart. If you want them because they look "cool" buy them, if you want a rugged pair of work boots, look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Paul-NC

customer_reviews.title: I believe those are the best shoes for the price I've ever worn
customer_reviews.text: I believe those are the best shoes for the price I've ever worn. I use them for some light construction work and they are not cold or hot in most weather conditions. They are extremely comfortable for long time wear. After a month of use they hold up really well even after substantial daily abuse. Zipper on side is a brilliant thing. It's high quality and serves its purpose for putting shoes on and off really well. I would recommend those shoes for anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Roman

customer_reviews.title: Best work boots I've found!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a pair of these 1.5 years ago and have loved these boots! I Install hard surface flooring for a living (Tile and Hardwood) and I'm really hard on shoes. Most boots split at the sides inside a few months with all the up and down, and hard toes are even worse. These have stood up to everything, and have been extremely comfortable as well. I'm buying a new pair because I've finally worn through the soles. Other than that, they're still holding up perfectly. I cannot recommend these things highly enough. I've spent twice as much on boots that didn't last half as long.
customer_reviews.author: BC 1217

customer_reviews.title: comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I liked the price but cheap is still cheap. That being said wear em out and toss em. My boots felt comfortable until I wore them for work. I work in the field, hard work long hours. For the next week I had to wear mole skin and bandaids on my heals. The problem was the heal area just fell apart. Its some kind of light weight cotton fabric that rolled up and caused blisters where it rubbed. I finally just cut the rolled up heal material off and kept working. A better heal pocket maybe leather and this review would of been better.
customer_reviews.author: Chad

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable from day one, really wide fit.
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable from day one. Very wide if that is what you are looking for. Durable so far with some pretty hard use. Not sure how cool they will be in the summer heat so can't vouch for that. Only thing I don't love is the treads are really aggressive and grab every clod of muck to track into my customers homes. Some people may need this so not a negative in all situations.
customer_reviews.author: Shocktherapy

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Boots appear to be well made and are comfortable right out the box. After a month of wear they have broken in nicely. No pressure spots. Applied water treatment and have no spots on leather. Remember these are not regular duty boots. Geared towards Investigators or administration. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Chandler

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Cheap design and poor materials Soles wore away inside of 2 months use, I've had pencil erasers last longer. The side zipper does not allow enough give to easily put on or take off the boot with laces tied which is made even more difficult since they lack any kind of loop or pull tag. There are much better boots for the money out there these were a waste of my money
customer_reviews.author: Craig Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Great Boots! I have had these for about a year. I purchased some cushion and support insoles which helped me with walking home construction lots consistently. The zipper makes it easy to take off to walk in homes so I don't track mud on new carpets. No problems and have held up very well. About to order another pair.
customer_reviews.author: M Williams

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and durable, just not waterproof.
customer_reviews.text: These boots are really great, especially at the price point of $40. I'm really hard on boots and destroy about two to three pairs per year. The benefit with these is that they are extremely lightweight, comfortable, and cheap. You can move around in these like sneakers and that's helped with my back problems. The only downside is they are not waterproof. But after about a month of abuse they have held up as well as a $100 pair of boots.
customer_reviews.author: pool guy

customer_reviews.title: Love these boots
customer_reviews.text: Okay, honestly most comfortable boots I’ve ever owned. Love these and will be and advocate for this boot because I know it’s great. I’ve owned a pair for 4 months and they are seriously the best. I want another pair. They do get run down a bit quick. Granted I wear mine Every Single Day!!! They are a bit beat up considering their age. Love them and want another pair though. Also they come with a little gift. At least mine did! Hehe I love surprises
customer_reviews.author: Addison Schipper

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Received these on 12/30/18 and like I do I got them weather treated prior to usage I have worn them since and really have enjoyed them. The fit is spot on for me and they appear incredibly durable Plus they look great and didn't cost as nearly as much as my 5.11's that I like equally as well Time will tell on the durability but I expect great things
customer_reviews.author: smartbassist

customer_reviews.title: Not intended for outdoor activity.
customer_reviews.text: Was initially impressed with these boots but soon realized that the comfort came at a steep price. By day three of a week long prospecting trip in the mountains the little support in the ankles was gone and I suffered through the rest of my once yearly trip in pain due to the pronation of my ankles. I am not generally hard on my other boots and shoes but these gave me issues with knees and hips for several weeks after the conclusion of my trip. I wanted to like these boots but they let me down. Not intended, apparently, for any real activity. Would not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best $40 dollar boot out there
customer_reviews.text: This is the second pair of these boots I've bought. The first pair is still going strong but have been relegated to yard work. These boots are comfortable and wear well. If you are looking for a pair of boots in this price range buy them. You won't be disappointed. Don't expect these boots to compare with the high dollar boots. They are a great boot for the money.
customer_reviews.author: ezvnvet

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight quality boots
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a pair of the Ryno Gear Tactical Combat Boots for my husband about 2 wks ago for his construction job. He said they are one of the most comfortable fitting pair of boots that he has owned. They are lightweight, supporting, comforting and water resistant, just what he needs in boots. We were so overjoyed with this product that we have ordered and received another pair for him to wear for everyday use. Thank you for selling such a high quality boot! If we could, we would give you 10 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Henry

customer_reviews.title: Whahhh? Is it possible?
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable. Durable. AWESOME!!! 3 MONTHS IN AND SEE THEM LASTING WAY LONGER THAN THE USUAL 6 MONTH WEAR OUT OF OTHER SHOES! Did I mention? COMFORTABLE?!!! YEAH!!! So well fit and comfy? That I have sneakers gathering dust and probably won't wear anymore. You NEED these if you wanna walk on air on the jobsite brothers. No more foot pain or foot fatigue. Also? No funk. Ashamed to admit it...but...can wear the same pair of socks for a week...and still fresh as a daisy! I'm recently divorced. Don't judge me. Judge my review. These things are AWESOME!!! BUY EM!!! WEAR EM!!! LOVE EM!!! PERIOD!!!
customer_reviews.author: Michael K.

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding boots and customer service
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these boots and got them same day. I am very happy for the speedy delivery and the product. They included a pair of boot socks and some inserts for the boots which was a welcome surprise. The boots fit great and are very comfortable. The air holes make the boots breathable and not hot for my feet. I am very happy with this purchase and the product and customer service. I spent 15 years in the Marines and these boots remind me of my moon boots I used to wear. All around great experience. Will definitely recommend and rebuy in the future.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Bought these because I needed a light duty work boot. These boots felt awesome right out of the box. I have worn them on and off for about two weeks and they are falling apart from the inside out. They are becoming tough to wear: I think next time I will spend a bit more and get a better pair.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good boots for the winter.
customer_reviews.text: They are fairly boots, they really keep warm my feet which I found an excellent thing that boots must have, the only thing is that these boots are not stronger like other boots for construction. I do not recomend these boots for someone who work at construction or places where you handle heavy things because they have a smooth material that will not protect your feet from something heavy. Other than that these are really good boots.
customer_reviews.author: Rodolfo Torrontegui

customer_reviews.title: Decent stuff, good buy
customer_reviews.text: Nice, comfy, lightweight, appear well made. Order down a size, even if you have wide feet. I wear 12EEE in Corcorans, got a normal 12 in Rynos, and there's room for extra socks. Note...not waterproof, not safety toe.
customer_reviews.author: micheal hutchison

customer_reviews.title: A Nice Pair of Boots
customer_reviews.text: Keep feet nice and warm, very water proof. Also is very comfortable at the sole with the memory foam. Only complaint is that the foam skits tend to curl at the ankle and have to re-insert back into boot. Outside of that, a very durable tactical boot for work and hiking notable of the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Rebholz

customer_reviews.title: Durable, fit just right
customer_reviews.text: Wanted a mens size 7 1/2, but settled for a men's 7. I wear a size 9 in womens. They fit well. These boots really help when having to walk a dirt and rocks all day. I just hate that I am getting them dirty. I highly recommend these boots.
customer_reviews.author: k

customer_reviews.title: Good price, but the level of comfort not as expected
customer_reviews.text: Look good, good price, but the level of comfort was less then expected. Couldn’t even wear them a full shift of 8 hours. If a 10 hour shift was scheduled, I was limping by the time I went home.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Great for work!
customer_reviews.text: I just had a problem with these pair. There was something crooked inside. I got my daughter a pair also and she loves them for work. I'm going off what she said about hers and she loves him very much. I didn't want you to think that they were all bad I just happened to get a pair with something soon wrong. They come with the extra set of insoles for more Comfort if you need them.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie

customer_reviews.title: A good,  lite, durable boot
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd pair. Gave my old ones to a friend as a joke and he loved them and said he was going to keep bc they felt so good! Only thing I didn't like was that the tread wears fast bc it's a soft composite, [ I had them for about 3yrs.] Guess I was hoping they'd last forever?
customer_reviews.author: Tom from Tn

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable, durable, breathable
customer_reviews.text: I have not tested water resistance but after a few months and several miles these boots feel more like nice running shoes. I like the way the boots feel on the inside i don't like materials or stitching rubbing my feet and i usually wear thick socks so these boots are great for what i need. Since i started wearing these my knee pain and lower back pain has greatly diminished. i average 5-10 miles walking in a 6-8 hour shift The only thing I have not liked is on smooth wet concrete the grip is not good. walking to fast or stopping to quick you will slip.
customer_reviews.author: connie h.

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking. Fit great
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking.Fit great.There is one problem.When you unzip the zipper there is a webbing that doesn't allow the boot to open enough to slide on easily.It makes the zipper almost impossible to use.I cut the webbing close to the lace side of the boot.The boot now opens enough to slide on quite easily.Would have given 5 stars if I didn't have to modify the boot.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: boots are light
customer_reviews.text: The boots are very light and really do allow your feet to breathe . Great traction so far so good, only been wearing them for a week . Boots came as expected but one pair was missing a pair of the coolmax socks that were to be included . Company would not send them, they blamed Amazon for the mistake.
customer_reviews.author: G Packard

customer_reviews.title: Know your size!
customer_reviews.text: Know your size! These boots run a little small so know what size you need. For example, if you wear a size 11 US you should order a size up. They're also warm, despite the CoolMax lining. They're pretty comfortable even going from tennis shoes to boots. MAY 4 2019 EDIT: Buy extra laces. The laces that come with these boots are trash.
customer_reviews.author: Jens Rommel

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. Wearing them hiking on rugged hiking trails. I wear size 12, ordered size 13, little large but am very happy with them. Excellent value. Not waterproof, sprayed with waterproofing. Feet stay dry in wet grassy areas. Air holes on side of boot.
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: Best pair of boots I've owned
customer_reviews.text: These are the most comfortable pair of boots I've ever owned. They have great support and the shock absorbers feel like clouds under my feet. The zippers on the side make them really easy to take on and off. 10/10 recommend
customer_reviews.author: Judith Olson Orr

customer_reviews.title: great deal
customer_reviews.text: The boots are very comfortable and good ventilation, as far as waterproof I use a can of waterproofing and stain resistance and they hold up and look like new.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Z.

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: To be fair these boots are meant for hiking/working in dry and hot climates. I got the boots for playing airsoft in the summer time, I needed extra ankle support and the ability to have comfortable dry feet. So far these boots do exactly as advertised. I was surprised to find a pair of coolmax socks that came with the boots that was a nice plus. The boots do fit a bit tight around my shins and I would recommend some kinda gel soles for added comfort and if your looking to rain proof them, get some otter wax.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Whispell

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and true to color as pictured.
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots. They are quite comfortable. They are true to color (sand). Some of the competition in this style show boots looking light tan, but when they arrived were light brown.
customer_reviews.author: J. Hunt

customer_reviews.title: Good walking boot, average comfort for long standing periods, but I'd buy these again
customer_reviews.text: I love the lightness and feel of these. Good walking boots, not the best standing boots. I wish the toe box was a little taller (or my big toe skinnier) The inner lining's already ripped and worn at the heel, but it's not chafing. Wish that was stronger or a better wear material. I wish I had combat boots like these when I was in the infantry.
customer_reviews.author: DanB

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: They run a little big. Other than that, great for the price. I do hvac and they lasted over a year. I still wear them but they're beat. The key here is their $35. I've paid $200 for boots that last about as long. Plus i got a free pair of socks! Will buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Barger

customer_reviews.title: Love em! Love em! Love em!!
customer_reviews.text: LOVED these boots! Fit and felt like more expensive brands without the pricetag! Will be purchasing again as soon as these wear out. (Nearly a year and still going strong!!). Water resistance leaves alot to be desired but for the comfort, its a trade i can live with!
customer_reviews.author: Harold Horton

customer_reviews.title: Great boots!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I loved these boots. Been wearing them for work for over a year. I wish I could get another pair. But they show as unavailable. I order a similar pair but no where near as comfortable!! I find myself wearing these over the new ones even though they are beat up.
customer_reviews.author: David Rotter

customer_reviews.title: Serves my purpose
customer_reviews.text: The boots I will use when doing yard landscape. They look great and feel even better too wear They should last a very long time. Very satisfied!!!
customer_reviews.author: Carlos H. Davila Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Great boot for a great price
customer_reviews.text: These boots are sooooo comfortable. I normally have to order a size 12 in most shoes to allow for extra room but the 11 fits like a glove. I can walk all day in these and feel like I can keep going. I work as a parking lot associate and can walk anywhere between 6 and 13 miles depending on the length of the shift and my feet still feel good by the end of the shift. At this price I'm going to order 2 pairs.
customer_reviews.author: Ed Owsley

customer_reviews.title: Comfort And Stylish Boot
customer_reviews.text: For the cost to comfort ration I give these boots 5 Stars. Been wearing them a month now very comfortable and stylish get a lot of guys ask me who makes them!
customer_reviews.author: epw

customer_reviews.title: Great boots
customer_reviews.text: This is the second pair I buy from them, they are very Comfortable and Breathable. I work in the executive protection field. most of the time when my client is not at a event and I don’t have to wear a suit and tie this is my go to pair of shoes with some b.d.u and a polo shirt.
customer_reviews.author: Abdel cabrera

customer_reviews.title: Wrong color
customer_reviews.text: Placed the order for tan boots. Received black boots that the tags were off of and had scuff marks already on them. Obviously a pair returned by someone else. They fit smaller and don’t run big like suggested. Price is cheap enough I will wear them out but if ordering I’d suggest 1 size bigger and be willing to wear whatever color you get.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Ingles

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting a boot that was very comfortable. The boot did not meet expectations unfortunately. For some reason when I put them on my feet feel very tired, I could feel every rock through the soul of the boot. They look great, and the zipper on the side was very nice. I purchased these due to all the other reviews saying that this was a very comfortable boot, however, I'm left disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: SOS

customer_reviews.title: These are outstanding!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd set of these boots and they are awesome!! Super comfortable right out of the box and my last pair lasted 3 years.. Yes, I wore them everyday of that 3 years +/- a day or two. Everything held up great, I only bought new ones because I wore through the treads on the bottom. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Very, very comfortable, perfect fit.
customer_reviews.text: I like the width, (wide), comfort (extra nice cushioned insert enclosed), and repels water very well (wore out in the snow, dried quickly and no stains. Scuffs clean up nicely with a stiff brush. Overall very satisfied with this boot. Zippered side a plus.
customer_reviews.author: D.W. RICKETTS

customer_reviews.title: Received on time and in good condition.
customer_reviews.text: Just received the boots and tried them on and walked around the house some. Haven't had a chance to use them for hiking and tactical training yet. Can not give a good evaluation yet.
customer_reviews.author: E.A. White

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: These boots are the most comfortable I have purchased from Amazon. I am typically a 10.5 wide, and a size 11 fits perfectly, and allows for thicker socks in the cold weather months without losing comfort.
customer_reviews.author: CW

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Boots
customer_reviews.text: I am so thankful to have bought these boots I have never had boot that keep my feet cool and help my sore feet I will buy another pair
customer_reviews.author: R. Bowers

customer_reviews.title: Just tossed my $150 511's in the trash
customer_reviews.text: Great boot great price, 1st time I ever bought a boot at this price and they actually fit my feet, boots already feel like they are broken in. The side zip is quality and works for fast on and off, the color is right the laces are thick the eyelet holes are metal and feel thick. Just a great everyday work boot And like it says I just tossed my expensive 511's in the trash
customer_reviews.author: Jason Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great boot for the weekend warrior!
customer_reviews.text: For the price these are great boots if you plan on doing a hike or going out shooting these will do you fine. However the side of the boots are a little weak other reviews have gone into more detail about it but if you plan on beating the ever living H out of your boots you might want to step up your price range a little bit. that being said I was torn between a 4* and a 3* since they are perfect for what I will use them for and very comfortable but I could see how contractors, military and hardcore outdoorsman might find them inferior. 3 3/4* would be more accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Stone

customer_reviews.title: Great so far
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots so far. Going to buy a black pair for work (part time 2nd job) after the Holidays. Obviously not sure about long term durability but plenty comfortable and for "normal" sizing they fit my wide feet perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: RAKC

customer_reviews.title: Fit perfect
customer_reviews.text: They fit great. Light and comfy. Plus I do alot of contracting and job sites. I fell I will have no non problems walking on debris. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: MIKE HEIST

customer_reviews.title: Nice boots
customer_reviews.text: What can I say? They fit, they're comfortable, and only time will tell if they're durable, but by then they probably won't be made by the same manufacturer or they won't be available any more. Big business sucks.
customer_reviews.author: R. C Jebe

customer_reviews.title: Nice Boots for the Price!
customer_reviews.text: The husband loved these boots. He said they were comfortable and he liked the way the fit. He looks really sexy in his tactical boots. 💋
customer_reviews.author: Quintin W.

customer_reviews.title: Good fit, immediately comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Wore these for a 10 hour shift at work the day after I got them, and never had to switch to the backup shoes. Good traction on flour covered floors, and water, less on oil but better than some other shoes I've worked with at the bakery. That makes Day 1 a complete success.
customer_reviews.author: Jason W.

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied with these boots! They feel very comfortable and I’m looking forward to testing them out at work
customer_reviews.author: Joseph O.

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Overall their a decent pair of boots. Inside lining ripped pretty fast but the outside of the boots are durable. Easy to get them on and off.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: I have been wearing boots for my work for over 10 years. I have tried a lot of different brands. These boots really surprise me how comfortable they are. It’s a really good buy for the price. I don’t know how long they will last. But most likely I will buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Bought a pair for my dad.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these boots for my dad, he really loves these boots. Very comfortable and they look great!
customer_reviews.author: Soul Brother of KungFu

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable boot with side zipper. I wear a 10 1/2, ordered 11, fit perfect. The only improvement would be a larger Velcro strap to secure the zipper.
customer_reviews.author: S. Luedke

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: These fit true to size. I tied them the first time and just use the zipper. Haven't had to ever tie again. I've hunted in them, walked a few dozen miles in them, and now work every day in them. I keep trying to order a couple more pairs buy they go quick
customer_reviews.author: William Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Close to great
customer_reviews.text: A very comfortable pair of shoes I was expecting the zipper to allow a little bit more space when unzipped but you still have to untie and tie them even with the zipper feature they don't allow quite enough expansion to only use the zipper for donning and Doffing
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really great for the price
customer_reviews.text: These are really comfortable and I like wearing them a lot. The side zipper makes it easy to take the boots off, and they ventilate really well also.
customer_reviews.author: Jason L

customer_reviews.title: Great boots
customer_reviews.text: Great pair of boots. Got them for working in the yard and riding the motorcycle. No complaints!
customer_reviews.author: CPG RZ Review

customer_reviews.title: Love these boots
customer_reviews.text: I'm out running around the mountains or in the desert a lot, and these boots are very comfortable. They fit perfectly and very enjoyable to wear.
customer_reviews.author: Shazini

customer_reviews.title: Versatile Boots with Comfort
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for my son. He does landscaping and he wears them 9 hours everyday. He also has worn them hunting. He texted me everyday for a week. “I love these boots” & “these boots are the bomb”. He didn’t expect all the comfort and good insulation for this price. He’s paid much more for less comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Mary J.

customer_reviews.title: Shoes that fit to the size ordered
customer_reviews.text: Most if the times when ordering shoes on line the shoes vary in size even though you order the correct size. I ordered a size 12 shoe in regular width and the shoes actually came to that size. They were not big or to small which happens a lot with other brands of shoes. They are very comfortable right out off the box I wore the shoes for 14 hours the first day. Great shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable boots, feel like I'm walking on cushions. Great quality, wish they made these in black.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great boots for a good price!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome boots! Very comfortable for daily wear at my job. Good cushion, easy to put on and take off. I wear a size 10, ordered a size 10 and they fit great. Will definitely order again when I wear these our. For the price, you will not beat this boot!
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Not highest quality but very good for the price.
customer_reviews.text: These lasted me about 8 months but the only thing that fell apart was the pull tab for the zipper. Didn't feel like a bad deal since they were inexpensive for boots, and wore well despite heavy constant use. You can get better but it might cost twice this. I may have been lucky but I'd recommend them if cost is a factor.
customer_reviews.author: Vilvestri

customer_reviews.title: This is the second pair i purchased. First pair ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the second pair i purchased. First pair lasted 6 months of very hard use. This pair lasted a week. The heel is very thin. I must have stepped on something to puncture it. It leaks just walking through a damp yard. After speaking with customer service, a new pair was shipped completely hassle free. Again, the first pair I purchases were great. Looking forward to tje replacements.
customer_reviews.author: Oldgrasscutter

customer_reviews.title: Why did you cheapen the shoe laces?
customer_reviews.text: This will be my fourth pair, I blow through these boots in 60 days, but I like them! Now you have a cheaper skinny shoe lace that won't last a month? Why??????
customer_reviews.author: Photog21

customer_reviews.title: The price is good for the comfort you get.
customer_reviews.text: I used them for work. They are comfortable feet didn’t hurt after being on feet for 12 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Miguel Cisneros

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase for the cost
customer_reviews.text: Great boot for the purchase price. Light color will show smudges and soil easily. It is a comfortable shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Evans

customer_reviews.title: ... had these for a week now but they are comfortable. Not sure about the durability but if worn ...
customer_reviews.text: I have only had these for a week now but they are comfortable. Not sure about the durability but if worn often then like all things, expect them to wear out. I normally wear a 9.5W so ordered the 10 as did not want to run into a just a wee bit to small or tight sizing issue. Glad I did and the free pair of socks was added bonus. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots, easy on easy off. they look great too, just like picture, comfortable for boots
customer_reviews.author: Zachariah king

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good...
customer_reviews.text: These are quite comfortable to wear as a hiking/hunting boot and yard work boot. I wore them as we traversed miles of terrain and did not feel much foot fatigue. I have only had these 1 month and so long term quality to TDB. However, given the price point (1/3 of some competitors), I'd be happy to purchase 3 pairs over the next couple of years if that becomes an issue. Good luck people.
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: super comfortable shoes
customer_reviews.text: perfect size and fit, very comfortable shoe, super fast break in, unfortunately they are not waterproof and it is stated that they are not, but they can be sprayed with waterproofing, when used with the coolmax socks they become even more comfortable, I will definitely be ordering more socks.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable Casual Footwear
customer_reviews.text: Boots are comfortable, but I need a shoehorn to get them on. The zipper really doesn't make them easy to put on, although it lets you take them off quickly and easily. They are not especially heavy duty but suitable for casual wear.
customer_reviews.author: M&M

customer_reviews.title: A good riding boot
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for riding my motorcycle, they are great! Small vents allow slight amount of air for hot days. Ended up using these for work! Great comfortable boot,i plan on buying more for riding.
customer_reviews.author: billy

customer_reviews.title: Not Accurate
customer_reviews.text: The boot DOSEN'T come with a side zipper. They do come with a free pair of socks.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick P. Reilly

product_meta.title: RYNO GEAR Tactical Combat Boots with Coolmax Lining
feature_bullets: Features a combination of leather and ballistic nylon for comfort and durability, Padded collar
Breathable mesh lining, Slip-resistant rubber outsole for added grip Water resistant inner lining
Removable shock absorbent insoles for your comfort

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
